alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 5:35PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... North Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... South Central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 535 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Uriah, McIntosh, Blacksher, Carlton, Tensaw, Malcolm, Toinette, Little River, Chrysler, Mount Pleasant, Fairford, Eliska, Hawthorn, Serange, Mineola, Chestang, Sims Chapel, Topton, Seaboard and Palmers Crossroads. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
